thread.title: BRIEF-Glaxosmithkline Says Updated Marketing Authorisation By European Commission Will Be Reflected In Label For Relvar Ellipta

title: BRIEF-Glaxosmithkline Says Updated Marketing Authorisation By European Commission Will Be Reflected In Label For Relvar Ellipta

organizations.name: european commission will be reflected in label for relvar ellipta reuters staff

text: March 8, 2018 / 8:11 AM / Updated 24 minutes ago BRIEF-Glaxosmithkline Says Updated Marketing Authorisation By European Commission Will Be Reflected In Label For Relvar Ellipta Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 8 (Reuters) - Glaxosmithkline Plc: * UPDATED MARKETING AUTHORISATION BY EUROPEAN COMMISSION WILL BE REFLECTED IN LABEL FOR RELVAR ELLIPTA FOR COUNTRIES IN EUROPEAN UNIONâ€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
